Method Detail

getPrimaryDescription

SharedObjectDescription getPrimaryDescription()
Get SharedObjectDescription to be used to create primary (local) IFileShare implementation.

Returns:
SharedObjectDescription to be used to create primary IFileShare implementation

getListener

IFileShareListener getListener()
Get listener for file share being created. Typically, provider will call this method during the implementation of createFileShare. If this method returns a non-null IFileShareListener instance, the newly created file share must notify the given listener when file share events occur. If this method returns null, then no listener will be notified of file share events

Returns:
IFileShareListener to use for notification of received file share events

getRemoteFileID

ID getRemoteFileID()
Get ID identifying remote file.

Returns:
ID an ID identifying remote file. IDs returned from this method should have been created using the Namespace made available via IFileShareContainer.getFileNamespace() method
